definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Migraines are one of the few neurological disorders to subside with age.
sentences.chinese: 偏頭痛是隨着年齡發作率遞減的神經系統疾病之一。

sentences.english: Herzog and Simons are optimistic about the prospects for making progress against migraines.
sentences.chinese: 荷佐和賽門斯對於治療偏頭痛的未來進展頗爲樂觀。

sentences.english: For migraine sufferers, summer can be a perilous time of year.
sentences.chinese: 對偏頭痛患者來說，夏季是一年中的危險時段。

sentences.english: As a result, childhood migraines are often dismissed as sinus headaches.
sentences.chinese: 因此，小孩的偏頭痛往往被診斷爲鼻竇炎疼痛。

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the clinical effect of Shuluotong capsules on blood-stasis migraine.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察舒絡通膠囊治療血瘀型偏頭痛的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To reveal the mechanism of traditional Chinese drug Tianle capsule in treatment of migraine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討天樂膠囊治療偏頭痛的作用機理。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effects of Tongluo Huoxue Decoction on hemicrania.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察通絡活血湯治療偏頭痛的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Conclusion HP infection might be an important dangerous fact in pathogenesis of hemicrania.
sentences.chinese: 結論HP感染可能是偏頭痛發病的一個重要危險因素。

sentences.english: The tranquilizing and allaying excitement methods had an advantage than common acupuncture group on treating hemicrania.
sentences.chinese: 鎮靜安神針刺法治療偏頭痛遠期療效優於普通針刺組。

sentences.english: THE BOTTOM LINE Most studies have found that being left-handed does not increase the risk of migraines.
sentences.chinese: 下面聯接到更多發現左撇子不增加偏頭痛風險的研究。

sentences.english: Does migraine break out period should the patient do classics skull much general to strap an examination?
sentences.chinese: 偏頭痛發作期的患者要做經顱多普勒檢查嗎？

sentences.english: The gene locus was especially strongly linked to female migraine sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 這個基因位點與女性偏頭痛患者的關聯尤其強烈。

sentences.english: However, only 20% of migraine sufferers have a dietary trigger.
sentences.chinese: 然而，僅有20%的偏頭痛患者的誘因來自於食物。

sentences.english: Objective To explore clinical characteristics and changes of electroencephalography (EEG) in children with migraine.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討兒童偏頭痛臨牀特點和腦電圖變化。

sentences.english: Objective To observe therapeutic effect of acupuncture on no- premonitory migraineatremission stage.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察針刺對緩解期無先兆偏頭痛的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: For example, excessive yawning often precedes seizures in people with epilepsy and pain in people with migraine headaches.
sentences.chinese: 例如，癲癇和偏頭痛患者就會經常發現他們哈欠過多。
